title: Stephen Crane's The Red Badge of Courage: The Graphic Novel
description: Stephen Crane's classic tale of the American Civil War tells the story of Union soldier Henry Fleming. As Fleming waits for action with his fellow soldiers, he wonders if he is a hero or a runner. Will he and his fellow soldiers survive, or fall to the wounds they call red badges of courage? Fear, courage, and hope are retold in an illustrated graphic novel edition,
author: Wayne Vansant
